name: Bastion
description: A heavily fortified defensive structure serves as a stronghold and symbol of military power. The defensive focus provides excellent protection, while the martial atmosphere creates tension with civilians and can feel oppressive or reassuring depending on circumstances.
atmosphere: Thick stone walls and defensive towers dominate the strategic position while soldiers drill in formation on parade grounds. Military precision echoes in barked commands and clashing weapons. The air carries steel, leather, and strict discipline. Arrow slits and murder holes provide defensive advantages against attackers.
